message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_CASE_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: Case Reassignment Notification

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_ISSUECASE_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: Issue Case Reassignment Notification

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_CASE_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: Case %1s, has been reassigned by %2s

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_ISSUECASE_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: The following issue case(s), have been reassigned by %2s : %1s

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_USERCASE_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: The following case(s), have been reassigned by %2s : %1s

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_ASSIGN_CASE_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: Case Assignment Notification

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_ASSIGN_ISSUECASE_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT
message.locale: Issue Case Assignment Notification

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_ASSIGN_CASE_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: You have been assigned the %1s role on %2n by %3s

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_ASSIGN_ISSUECASE_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: You have been assigned the %1s role on the following issue cases by %3s : %2n

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_ASSIGN_USERCASE_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: You have been assigned the %1s role on the following cases by %3s : %2n

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_CASE_NOT_BE_CLOSED_TEXT
message.locale: Case Reference No %1n is closed and cannot be reassigned.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_RESERVED_CASETASKS_SELECTION_EMPTY
message.locale: You must select a party to forward a task, or tasks to.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_RESERVED_CASETASKS_MULTIPLEVALUES
message.locale: Please select only one party to forward a task, or tasks to.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_RESERVED_CASETASKS_NO_TASK_SELECTED
message.locale: You have not selected any tasks to forward.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_RESERVED_CASETASKS_NOT_RESERVED
message.locale: The task, %1n, is no longer reserved by this user and cannot be forwarded.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_FORWARD_RESERVED_CASETASKS_CLOSED
message.locale: The task, %1n, is closed and cannot be forwarded.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_ISSUE_REASSIGN_USERNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Please select a user to reassign this issue case to, or else choose Auto Reassign.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_ISSUE_REASSIGN_USERNAME_MULTIPLEVALUES
message.locale: Please indicate only one option, to reassign to a user, or to perform an auto reassign.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_ISSUE_REASSIGN_USER_INACTIVE
message.locale: User %1s is not an active user, and issue cases cannot be reassigned to this user.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_ISSUE_REASSIGN_CASE_EMPTY
message.locale: No issue case has been selected for reassignment.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_CASE_ISSUE_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The field 'Choose Date' cannot be blank.
